parse_error: I had trouble understanding your run details. Please try again with a clearer format, e.g., 'I ran 5k in 30 minutes, felt great'.
missing_data_error: I couldn't find all the necessary details for your run (distance, duration, or effort). Please provide them.
success_confirmation: Great job! I've logged your run. Keep up the good work!
generic_error: I'm sorry, I couldn't log your run at this moment. Please try again later.
